description:
If you like Mail Lists Lite you will love the full version. Mail Lists is your perfect pal for your mailing needs. Mail Lists is capable to store, organize and use mailing, messaging & mixed(2) lists, and maximize the capabilities of your webOS device's e-mail and messaging app.

With Mail Lists you can:

+ Create, manage and edit mailing, messaging and mixed lists.

+ Send emails or text messages to multiple recipients at a time.

+ Select only some recipients from the list, send emails to an entire list or a single contact in the list.

But if it looks good for you, this is just the begining: the way Mail Lists has been developed enables Mail Lists to interact with webOS Universal Search, Contacts and e-mail(1), allowing you the following:

+ Search for mailing lists and compose emails from Contacts, compose and discard some (or all, if you want) contacts from the mail list.

+ Search for mailing lists and compose from Universal Search.

+ Search for mailing lists directly in E-mail app.

(1) System integration only supported for Mailing Lists.
(2) This feature depends on carrier support.

Lite version limited to up to 3 mailing and 3 messaging lists with 3 contacts each list. To remove ads and limitations, please purchase Mail Lists
